subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Deon Thompson and Ty Lawson each scored 16 points for No. 1 North Carolina, which used a 25-0 first-half run to cruise to a 92-63 victory against North Carolina State on Saturday in Chapel Hill.
snippet: Deon Thompson and Ty Lawson each scored 16 points for No. 1 North Carolina, which used a 25-0 first-half run to cruise to a 92-63 victory against North Carolina State on Saturday in Chapel Hill.
